description: Discover the best hotels in Brockenhurst, United Kingdom. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Historic Brockenhurst Manor Escape near New Forest National Park with Day Spa & Outdoor Hot Tubs
hotels.description: Escape to the charming village of Brockenhurst with a stay at New Park Manor, a historic manor house turned luxury hotel. This idyllic retreat offers guests the chance to explore the stunning New Forest National Park, with miles of walking trails and wildlife-spotting opportunities. After days spent in the great outdoors, return to the hotel's day spa for a dip in the hot tubs, or savour locally sourced British cuisine at the casual eatery Vinery, or the more dressed-up Stag.

seo.title: Hotels in Brockenhurst - United Kingdom Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
